Cherrycake\Modules\Login::loadUser

loadUser

If a user is logged, gets it and loads it into $this->user

    Signature

    public function loadUser()

    Returns

    bool
    Whether the user was successfully retrieved. False if there's no logged user, or if there's an error while retrieving it.
